Clear memoise cache

Source: R/zzz.R
clear_cache_rmangal.Rd

Clear memoise cache

clear_cache_rmangal()

Details

Clear memoise cache generated by mem_get(), a memoise function around httr::GET() used in get_gen in get_singleton
